cause.description:
"Improbable as it is, unlikely as it is, we are being set up as a *Beacon of Hope* for our country."
The children of today are our future leaders and all must be done in our power to get the best for them and good living conditions to enhance their future and to provide them better environment.We are keen in helping these needy children, take them off the street and give them places to lay their heads.The way to get to childrens heart is to give them a good quality education, water to drink, good and nutritious meals and to create a peaceful environment for them so they can learn and feel part of this big world of ours and not feel deprived of the good nature we have.
We thank God and everybody who lovingly and willingly would want to extend a helping hand to these needy people.Thank you all in the name of God.
Come and Join us in this noble cause and make the *Difference*.
[P.S. cause is under development]
1. Education and Health is a universal right.
cause.mission: Create awareness among people through provision of education.
cause.name: The Beacon of Hope
